T02D3775:193b-1: dza la ba lim bi dhi n'a ma /
T02D3775:193b-3: chu gtor gyi cho ga zhes bya ba /
T02D3775:193b-4: dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D3775:193b-5: dad pa can gang zhig gis las su bya ba
T02D3775:193b-6: la phan yon che la sla ba ni chu gtor
T02D3775:193b-7: yin pas 'di la brtson par bya'o //
T02D3775:193b-8: de la rin po che'i snod mdzes pa'i nang du
T02D3775:193b-9: chu blugs la phye dang me tog la sogs pa
T02D3775:193b-11: gser la sogs pa rin po che rnam pa lnga bdar ba dang /
T02D3775:193b-12: kha zas ma smras pa ma smos pa sna tshogs dang /
T02D3775:193b-13: sman dang 'bru dang dril sogs pa sbyar na lhag par yang bzang ngo //
T02D3775:193b-14: spyir gtor ma'i las bgyi'o 'tshal la rtag pa drug ste sbyang ba la sogs pa'o //
T02D3775:193b-15: de la sbyang ba ni chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
T02D3775:193b-16: spel ba ni nam mkha' mdzod kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
T02D3775:193b-17: mos par bsgyur ba ni bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
T02D3775:193b-18: spyod pa la dbang ba ni rgya chen shugs ldan 'od kyi sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
T02D3775:193b-19: thob par byed pa ni ye shes skar mda'i sngags dang phyag rgyas so //
T02D3775:193b-20: dbang du bya ba ni lha mgon spyi'i sngags dang
T02D3775:193b-21: phyag rgyas te dbang sgyur 'khor lo'i sngags dang phyag
T02D3775:194a-0: rgyas so // de la bsam rgyud ni dang por bdag nyid lus bsrung @194a * //
T02D3775:194a-1: zhing lha'i sku phyag rgya chen por dran pa skyed la /
T02D3775:194a-2: tshad med pa bzhis byang chub mchog tu sems bskyed
T02D3775:194a-3: la dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su gsol zhing snying
T02D3775:194a-4: rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don dran par bya'o //
T02D3775:194a-5: bsngo ba yang bla na med pa'i byang chub chen por bsngo bar bya ste /
T02D3775:194a-6: de yang dmigs kyi bsngo ba ni sri zhu'i mgron sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
T02D3775:194a-7: nyan thos rang sangs rgyas la sogs pa dang /
T02D3775:194a-8: yon tan gyi mgron tshangs pa dang brgya byin dang 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /
T02D3775:194a-9: phyogs skyong bcu dang srung ma dam tshig can rnams dang /
T02D3775:194a-10: snying rje'i mgron 'gro ba ris drug gi sems can dang /
T02D3775:194a-11: khyad par du yang bdag gi lha mgon dang /
T02D3775:194a-12: yul gang na gnas pa'i sa bdag lha klu dang /
T02D3775:194a-13: lan chags kyi mgron tshe rabs bgrangs pa'i rkyen bgegs dang /
T02D3775:194a-14: phan gnod byed pa'i lha 'dre kun la yang mnyam snyoms su bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D3775:194a-15: de la dang po lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar la 'di skad du brjod do //
T02D3775:194a-16: aom sva bh'a ba bi shuddha: sarba dharmm'a:sva bh'a ba bi shuddho nya ham /
T02D3775:194a-17: lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar la sor
T02D3775:194a-18: mo rnams rtse sprad de tshigs zur can rin po
T02D3775:194a-19: che lta bur byas la sngags 'di brjod do //
T02D3775:194a-20: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga te bhyo bi shva mu
T02D3775:194a-21: khe bhya: sarba tha kham audga te spha ra na
T02D3775:194a-22: ai mam ga ga na kha sv'a h'a /
T02D3775:194a-23: lag pa thal mo sbyar la phyir bskyad de mthe bong gnyis bsnol la sngags 'di brjod do //
T02D3775:194a-24: aom aa mri ta kunda li ha na ha na h'um phat /
T02D3775:194a-25: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur bcangs la mdzub mo bsgrengs te sngags 'di brjod do //
T02D3775:194a-26: na ma:sarba ta th'a ga ta aa ba lo ki te aom sam bha ra sam bha ra h'um /
T02D3775:194a-27: lag pa g-yas pa rdo rje khu tshur snying gar bstan la /
T02D3775:194a-28: g-yon pa mchog sbyin gyi snod 'degs pa'i tshul du byas te sngags 'di brjod do //
T02D3775:194a-29: aom dzny'a na aa ba lo ki te sa manta
T02D3775:194a-30: spha ra na ra smi bha ba sa ma ya
T02D3775:194a-31: ma h'a ma nidu ru du ru hri da ya
T02D3775:194a-33: lag pa thal mo khong stong du sbyar la /
T02D3775:194a-34: sor mo rnams nang du bsnol te mthe bong gnyis gshibs te brkyang la sngags 'di brjod do //
T02D3775:194a-36: gra he shv'a ra pra bha dzyo ti ma h'a sa ma ya sv'a h'a /
T02D3775:194a-37: sngags dang phyag rgya 'di gcig la yang lan bdun bdun bzlas so //
T02D3775:194a-38: de yang dang pos ni gtor ma skyon med cing dag pa chen por byin gyis brlab //
T02D3775:194b-0: gnyis pas ni mchod pa'i @194b rdzas kyi khyad par bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /
T02D3775:194b-1: sems cad thams cad kyi mos pa ji lta ba
T02D3775:194b-2: bzhin nam mkha'i khams 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas gang
T02D3775:194b-4: de ltar spel nas gsum pas ni bdud rtsi'i rgya mtsho dang /
T02D3775:194b-5: zas la sogs pa longs spyod la ji ltar so
T02D3775:194b-6: sor mos pa bzhin du longs spyod kyi rkyen dug
T02D3775:194b-7: lnga'i gsos dang / ye shes lngar byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D3775:194b-8: bzhi pas ni 'phags pa rnams kyi spyan lam du
T02D3775:194b-9: yang gzhal med khang brtsegs ma la sogs pa mchod
T02D3775:194b-10: pa'i sprin phung mang por sprul nas mchod pa dang
T02D3775:194b-11: / sems can rnams kyi dbang po'i spyod yul du
T02D3775:194b-12: ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga
T02D3775:194b-13: char bzhin du 'byung bar bsam zhing /
T02D3775:194b-14: khyad par du yang yi dags kyi rnam pa mang
T02D3775:194b-15: po dang sems can kun gyi bsam pa yongs su
T02D3775:194b-16: skong bar byin gyis brlab bo //
T02D3775:194b-17: lnga pas ni bdag gi lus zhing gi rdul snyed
T02D3775:194b-18: du sprul nas 'phags pa rnams la mchod pa phul
T02D3775:194b-20: sems can la byin pas pham rgyal med pa dang
T02D3775:194b-21: 'thab rtsod med pa so so'i mos pa bzhin thob
T02D3775:194b-23: drug pas ni sri zhu'i mgron dang yon tan gyi mgron dang /
T02D3775:194b-25: lan chags kyi mgron du gyur pa'i rigs la yang
T02D3775:194b-26: dam tshig gi dbang gis 'go zhing stong grogs su
T02D3775:194b-27: gyur par mngon sum du dmigs so //
T02D3775:194b-28: sems can gyi don du 'gyur ba'i las mi 'gal
T02D3775:194b-29: bar ci bcol ba yang 'grub ste phyag rgya yang
T02D3775:194b-30: phyogs bcur bstan la dbang du bya'o //
T02D3775:194b-31: de nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis kyang bsngo bar bya'o //
T02D3775:194b-32: gtan pa med pa'i mchod spyin rgyal po 'di ;
T02D3775:194b-33: / chos nyid rnam par dag pa'i byin rlabs dang //
T02D3775:194b-34: dkon mchog yon tan dpag med che ba dang //
T02D3775:194b-35: snying po phyag rgya nges pa'i dam tshig dang //
T02D3775:194b-36: rgyu rkyen rten 'brel tshogs pa'i nus mthu dang //
T02D3775:194b-37: drang srong rig 'dzin rnams kyi grub pa dang //
T02D3775:194b-38: bdag gi smon lam ting 'dzin shes rab kyis //
T02D3775:194b-39: ye shes lnga yi 'od zer rnam par 'phro //
T02D3775:194b-40: dbang po lnga yi longs spyod mkho dgur ldan //
T02D3775:194b-41: nam mkha'i mtha' klas gter chen gyur pa 'di //
T02D3775:194b-42: mchod gnas bla ma khyed kyi pho brang du //
T02D3775:194b-43: mchod pa'i sprin gyis rgyas shing 'phel bar bsngo //
T02D3775:195a-0: sems can thams cad bde gyur cig / kun kyang gnod pa @195a * //
T02D3775:195a-2: yang ni de bzhin gshegs bsngags pa'i //
T02D3775:195a-3: 'dod pa phun sum tshogs gyur cig / yang ni sems can thams cad kyang //
T02D3775:195a-4: bsam pa yid bzhin grub gyur cig / byol song gcig la gcig za ba'i //
T02D3775:195a-5: gnod pa de dag yongs ma 'byung //
T02D3775:195a-6: yi dags rnams la zas skom sogs //
T02D3775:195a-7: thogs pa med par 'byung gyur cig / sems na dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal gang //
T02D3775:195a-8: mi bzad rnam pa sna tshogs pa //
T02D3775:195a-9: bsod nas sa byin pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
T02D3775:195a-10: de dag myur du zhi gyur cig / sa'am mkha' la 'khod pa yi //
T02D3775:195a-11: lha klu gnod sbyin dri za dang //
T02D3775:195a-13: dge ba'i bsam pa rdzogs gyur cig //
T02D3775:195a-14: de nas chos kyi sbyin pa yang rgya cher bya'o //
T02D3775:195a-15: chos rnams thams cad rgyu las byung //
T02D3775:195a-16: de rgyu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs //
T02D3775:195a-17: de la 'gog pa gang yin pa //
T02D3775:195a-18: dge sbyong chen pos de skad gsungs //
T02D3775:195a-19: sdig pa ci yang mi bya ste //
T02D3775:195a-20: dge ba phun sum tshogs par spyad //
T02D3775:195a-21: rang gi sems ni yongs su gdul //
T02D3775:195a-22: 'di ni sangs rgyas bstan pa yin //
T02D3775:195a-23: zhes bya ba la sogs pa zhal nas gsungs pa'i
T02D3775:195a-24: tshigs su bcad pa mang pos chos dang zang zing
T02D3775:195a-25: gnyis su med pa'i sbyin pa rgya chen por bya'o
T02D3775:195a-26: // de ltar chos dang zang zing gi sbyin pa
T02D3775:195a-27: rnams pa gnyis kyis sgrib pa rnam pa gnyis byang
T02D3775:195a-28: tshogs gnyis rdzogs te bla na med pa'i byang chub
T02D3775:195a-30: slob dpon dza ya se nas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D3775:195a-32: // / zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba dge slong rin
